title: [Large-scale] Educational Program Utilizing Interactive 3D Tools for Engineering Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Engineering Foundational Concepts and Intermediate-Level Professional Knowledge
context.additional_context: Offline curriculum designed for university learners from medical/legal/technical professions to apply engineering concepts in practice. Emphasizes knowledge transfer efficiency through interactive learning tools using digital devices

learning_goals: Using interactive 3D animations, learners can analyze complex engineering systems with over 80% accuracy
By comparing continuous video and image materials, learners can identify media formats most suitable for understanding engineering concepts with over 70% selection rates
Learners can explain differences in the effectiveness of interactive tools based on prior knowledge levels and develop learning strategies accordingly
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
